description.message: Google Latitudeの非公式な拡張機能です。  バックグラウンドで場所を更新します。

turnOn.description: Turn on message for Chromitude icon tooltip

turnOff.description: Turn off message for Chromitude icon tooltip

clickToUpdate.message: 場所を更新する事をクリックする
clickToUpdate.description: When a user opts in to using a fixed location, this tooltip will occur, with the Chromitude Icon always appearing 'off' by default.

locationHasBeenUpdated.description: Displayed in a Toast Notification when the user's location has been updated.

generalTab_accuracyGroup_highAccuracyLab.message: Use the Highest Available Accuracy (May use more battery life)
generalTab_accuracyGroup_highAccuracyLab.description: Enable GPS Sensor if available.  Should note that it will take battery life.

generalTab_notificationsGroup_notifyOnUp.message: Notify me when my location is updated
generalTab_notificationsGroup_notifyOnUp.description: Checkbox to notify a user when their location is updated via a toast notification

generalTab_fixedLocationGroup.description: Group Name for settings indicative of a stationary, fixed position.

generalTab_fixedLocationGroup_descriptio.message: Setting a fixed location will disable watching for updates when your location changes.  Instead, this allows you to set a specific latitude and longitude of where you are located and changes the Chromitude icon in the extension bar from turning Chromitude on and off to updating your location to the specified coordinates.
generalTab_fixedLocationGroup_descriptio.description: A description of how fixed location works and why one would use it.

generalTab_fixedLocationGroup_checkboxLa.message: Use a fixed location instead of polling for new locations

generalTab_fixedLocationGroup_locationLa.description: Prompt for the coordinates of a fixed location.

generalTab_fixedLocationGroup_locationPl.description: Placeholder text to guide the user on what to enter for a fixed location.

experimentalFeaturesTab_description.message: Experimental Features are those slightly buggy, not yet complete, or essentially useless features that are not yet ready for use.  Some may only be accessible by using the developer console within the extension itself.  Clearly, these aren't for everyone but are available here for people wanting to tinker with the code of the extension itself.
experimentalFeaturesTab_description.description: Description of what experimental features are.

experimentalFeaturesTab_checkinsGroup_de.message: This feature currently has no end-point for the average user.  Enabling this will poll the Google Map's Places API every time a fresh location is given by the Geolocation Watcher.  The results will be placed in the array document.places and include all 'Places' that are within 100+accuracy meters of the coordinates issued by the geolocation watcher.  To check in to the place, you will have to run the function checkIn from the developer console with the reference string of the place as the only parameter.

creditsTab.description: Name of the tab for acknowleding people who've helped the project

creditsTab_contributorsGroup.description: Name of the group of people who have contributed files to the project

creditsTab_contributorsGroup_list.message:

creditsTab_donorsGroup.description: Name of the group of people who have donated money for the continued work on the project
